title.narrative: F.a: Equality and Non-Discrimination for Sustainable Peace (ENDS)

description.narrative: The project will intervene to raise awareness among both Dalits and non-Dalits and prepare them to speak up against unlawful and inhuman practices of caste-based discrimination and untouchability, educate and sensitise government authorities on the anti-di scrimination legal provisions and measures. The project will mobilise human rights defenders for supporting victims and empower them to seek justice through formal process, and educate and empower women and youths to engage in peace building process in the ir community. This will contribute for the protection and promotion of fundamental human rights and freedom of Dalit, women and other marginalised groups in Nepal.Activities: • Monitoring / tracking caste based discrimination and human right violation ca ses mobilising human rights defenders• Documentation of human rights violation cases and dissemination• Evidence based advocacy• Raising awareness on the justice procedures and legal provisions related to non-discriminations and equality• Provide l egal support to the victims• Documentation of good initiatives of religious leaders and their associations for promoting non-discrimination and equality• Vertical and horizontal dialogues among government and non-government stakeholders combating caste based discriminations and promoting social harmony minimising tensions.• Marking relevant national / International days• Mobilising and connecting NNDSWO’s VDC level committee members in human rights defenders networks• Fact finding/case investiga tion and filing of First Information RegistrationRights-holders /beneficiaries: Dalit women and youth Implementing partner: Nepal National Dalit Social Welfare Organization (NNDSWO)
